Class DetailsViewController

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.masterController.DetailsViewControllerMaster
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.technician.DetailsViewController
public class DetailsViewController extends DetailsViewControllerMaster
Controller class for managing the details view in the technician role. Extends the DetailsViewControllerMaster to provide specific functionality for technicians.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the necessary configurations. Logs the initialization process.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class DetailsViewControllerMaster

    • getShuttleList

      protected ArrayList<Shuttle> getShuttleList() throws IOException
      Retrieves the list of shuttles.
      Specified by:
      getShuttleList in class DetailsViewControllerMaster
      Returns:
      A list of shuttles.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the shuttle list.

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Reloads the details view for the selected shuttle. Loads the maintenance protocol, additional tasks, and progress bar.
      Specified by:
      reload in class DetailsViewControllerMaster

    • selectShuttle

      public void selectShuttle(Shuttle shuttle)
      Selects a shuttle and loads its content. If shuttle is null, loads default content.
      Parameters:
      shuttle - The shuttle to be selected, can be null

    • onNeueAufgabeClick

      public void onNeueAufgabeClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the click event for creating a new task. Creates a new task for the selected shuttle if it's in an appropriate status.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggering this method

    • onFreigebenButtonClick

      public void onFreigebenButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the click event for releasing a shuttle. Checks if all tasks are completed before allowing the shuttle to be released.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggering this method
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during the release process

    • onVerschrottenButtonClick

      public void onVerschrottenButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the click event for scrapping a shuttle. Requests confirmation and a reason for scrapping before proceeding.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggering this method

    • onBestellenButtonClick

      public void onBestellenButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the click event for ordering parts or supplies. Delegates to the view manager controller to handle the order process.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event triggering this method

    • selectShuttleInfoPopUp

      public void selectShuttleInfoPopUp()
      Displays an information popup alerting the user that no shuttle is selected. Used when operations requiring a shuttle selection are attempted without a selection.

    • checkUpdateRocketshipStage

      public boolean checkUpdateRocketshipStage()
      Checks and updates the stage (status) of the selected shuttle based on its current status. Different rules apply for different stages in the shuttle's maintenance lifecycle.
      Returns:
      boolean True if the shuttle stage was updated, false otherwise
